response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $120 for this item. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that align with your requirements. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 120}
